title: StartENG
body:
Elena: How much money did you bring?

<< if $isEnglish == false >>
[[Answer:Node|StartESP]]
<< endif >> 

[[Answer:Node|ENG1_a]]
<<  if $Budget1 == true >>
[[Answer:Node|ENG1_a]]
<<  endif >>

<<  if $Budget2 == true >>
[[Answer:Node|ENG1_b]]
<< endif >> 

<< if $Budget3 == true >>
[[Answer:Node|ENG1_c]]
<< endif >>

title: StartESP
body:
Elena: ¿Cuánto dinero trajiste?

<<  if $Budget == 14>>
    [[ answer: Node |ESP1_a]] ]]
<<  endif>>

<<  if $Budget == 13>>
    [[ answer: Node |ESP1_b]] ]]
<<  else >>
    [[ answer: Node |ESP1_c]] ]]
<<  endif >>

title: ENG2
body: Instructions: Select one drink, main dish, and dessert that fits within your budget.
